cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4586, Risk-Based Credit Examination Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 127 (Tuesday, July 20, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. WAGNER:
H.R. 4586.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3
[Page H3755]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

title: Risk-Based Credit Examination Act
